segments.text: The air is thick with the scent of soap and wet wood, a stark reminder of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but find the whole scene comical, yet alarming at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s cheeky grin as he grabs a cookie makes me laugh a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I glance at the puddle and feel a wave of anxiety wash over me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like watching a car crash in slow motion, I can feel the tension in the air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, poised and expectant, almost as if she knows this is naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, however, is in her own tranquil bubble, completely detached from reality.
segments.speaker: PAR
